name: Beat Blitzkrieg
description:
Beat Blitzkrieg is a multiplayer versus, rhythmn-based strategy games that pits two players against each other with dancing robots! Includes 3 stages and four different music tracks. The tempo of each song effects how the game is played!

Defeat all of the enemy player's robots to win!

Controls:

P1:

Move: WASD

Action: Space

P2:

Move: Arrow Keys

Action: Enter

A game by Sam Long, created in 72 hours during Ludum Dare 41
